title: Recruitments
description: We're looking for new members to join our team! If you are interested in joining us, please fill out the form below.

title: Farewell
description: A farewell event to celebrate the achievements of the graduating batch of 2025, featuring speeches, performances, and a nostalgic look back at their journey with Malang.
